description: Balanced public childhood survey capturing demographics, upbringing experiences, and adult wellbeing self-assessments.
notes: Placeholder codebook derived from header review only; replace with programmatically generated metadata before confirmatory analysis.

variables.name: selfage
variables.label: Respondent age (self-reported)
variables.comments: Use for cohort adjustments; verify min/max and outliers.

variables.name: religion
variables.label: Currently practices a religion
variables.original_question: Do you *currently* actively practice a religion?
variables.comments: Binary collapse planned (1=active,0=not); retain raw text until recode script is written.

variables.name: externalreligion
variables.label: Perceived childhood religious importance
variables.original_question: In childhood, how important was adherence to the religion?
variables.comments: Higher scores indicate stricter adherence environments.

variables.name: wz901dj
variables.label: Depression tendency (self-assessed)
variables.original_question: I tend to suffer from depression

variables.name: pqo6jmj
variables.label: Parents gave useful guidance (0-12)
variables.comments: Higher indicates more guidance; hypothesized protective factor.

variables.name: mds78zu
variables.label: Childhood emotional abuse (0-12)
variables.comments: Screen for fair-use; treat as sensitive attribute in disclosure review.

variables.name: classteen
variables.label: Teen household socioeconomic class
variables.comments: Cross-check against current class and net worth variables.

variables.name: networth
variables.label: Current net worth bracket
variables.comments: Outcome for mobility hypotheses; treat as ordered categorical.
